text: Richard James Codey (born November 27, 1946) is an American Democratic Party politician. He was the 53rd Governor of New Jersey from 2004 to 2006.Golway, Terry. "ON POLITICS; The Bishops, in Codey, Have a New Target", The New York Times, November 14, 2004. Accessed November 3, 2007. "He is a graduate of Oratory Prep in Summit, and his wife, Mary Jo, attended Caldwell College and Seton Hall, all Catholic institutions." He was in the New Jersey Senate since 1982 and was the President of the Senate from 2002 to 2010. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of New Jersey Category:State legislators of the United States Category:People from Orange, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard Codey
